meanings.definition: The edible root of the beet plant, typically dark red or purple in color.
meanings.sent1: I harvested fresh beetroots from the garden for our salad.
meanings.sent2: Beetroots add a vibrant color to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit tried to juggle the beetroots in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bright as a bunch of beetroots.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly picked beetroots filled the room.

meanings.sent1: We bought some beetroots to make a delicious salad.
meanings.sent2: The roasted beetroots were a hit at the dinner party.
meanings.sent3: The beetroots whispered secrets to the carrots in the fridge.
